item.title: Bears hire David Walker as running backs coachFeb 09, 2022The Bears on Wednesday hired David Walker as their new running backs coach. Walker boasts 25 years of coaching experience, including seven in the NFL as a running backs coach with the Colts (2011-14) and Lions (2016-18).

item.dc:creator: https://www.offcampuscareer.com/sitemapscanner/new

item.title: Bears QBs Fields, Dalton return to practiceDec 29, 2021After sitting out last Sunday's game in Seattle with injuries, the Bears' top two quarterbacks returned to practice Wednesday—starter Justin Fields (ankle) was limited, while backup Andy Dalton (groin) was a full participant.

item.title: Hicks downgraded to out for Packers gameDec 12, 2021Akiem Hicks had expressed hope Friday that he'd be able to return from an ankle injury that has sidelined him for three games and play Sunday night against the Packers. But the veteran defensive tackle was downgraded from questionable to out on Saturday.

item.title: Nagy will not coach Sunday's game vs. 49ersOct 31, 2021Matt Nagy remains quarantined after testing positive for COVID-19 Monday and will not coach Sunday's home game against the 49ers. Special teams coordinator Chris Tabor will assume head-coaching duties for the contest.
